BDLocation(BDLocation x)
          public BDLocation(double x, double y, float r){ super(); this.mLatitude = y; this.mLongitude = x; this.mRadius = r; this.mTime = Util.getTimeStr(); } public BDLocation(String time, double latitude, double longitude, float radius, String coorType, String addrStr) { super(); this.mTime = time; this.mLatitude = latitude; this.mLongitude = longitude; this.mRadius = radius; this.mCoorType = coorType; this.mAddrStr = addrStr; this.mTime = Util.getTimeStr(); }
